name: Cellscape
description:
Note: For the full experience we recommend the windows version, since we had to remove the features relating to sight.

You can only perform actions if you have the corresponding trait! You can obtain that trait by picking up the correct genes.

In Cellscape you are but a mere cell trying to survive. You can collect genes to add to your DNA that will give you traits, both positive or negative. Since you can only have a fixed number of genes, picking up more genes will cycle the genes which will cause your traits change drastically.
